EmailTemplate.name: 2018 - EMEAI HON Operators Conference Prague.201801_EMEAI_Invite_HONOperatorsCon
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited to the Honeywell Operators Conference in Prague - Jan 30 & 31
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE INVITATION Dear Customers/Partners,
We are pleased to invite you to the 2018 Honeywell Operators Conference!
Date: Jan 30-31, 2018 Location: Boscolo Prague, the Marriott Hotel <[[http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/prgak-boscolo-prague-autograph-collection/]]> Senovazne namesti 13/991 Prague 110 00 Czech Republic CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Operators_Conference_Prague.html]]> Learn about Honeywell Connectivity Solutions
Day One of our conference is open to everyone. We will highlight Honeywell’s Connectivity solutions covering all hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, STCs, and mandates.
View Day One agenda <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Operators_Conference_Prague.html]]> Pilots Technical Workshop by Honeywell Pilots
This is the first Honeywell Operators Conference with our pilots on board! They will be sharing many technical insights and their expertise. They are ready to answer your questions.
View Pilots Technical Workshop agenda <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Pilot_Technical_Workshop_1.pdf]]> Honeywell Approved Channel Partner Sessions
Day Two of is dedicated to our approved channel partners. Sessions will cover the customer portal, technical publications, the sales bulletins and more!
View Day Two agenda <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Operators_Conference_Prague.html]]> Please book your stay at Boscolo hotel by clicking on the link - Book your group rate for Honeywell <[[http://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%5EPRGAK%60HNGHNGA%60109%60EUR%60false%602%601/26/18%602/3/18%601/10/18&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]>
Please contact Anna.Tomova@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Anna.Tomova@honeywell.com]]> for questions.
We look forward to meeting you in Prague!
Anna Tomova Customer Support Manager
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Operators_Conference_Prague.html]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
